name: Micro Cosmic Worlds
description: Micro Cosmic Worlds is a discovery based journey into unseen worlds of the microcosmos. Using the power of virtual reality, you (the player) are transported deeper and deeper into the worlds of the infinitesimally small.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or Higher Processor: Intel Core i5 (or equivalent) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 GPU (or equivalent) Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 (or equivalent) Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 1080 GPU (or equivalent) Storage: 5 GB available space
